## Aplicação

$~~$Para o valor de $\Delta$, temos:

\begin{equation}
\Delta = b^2 - 4.a.c
\end{equation}

$~~$Para os valores de x, temos: 

\begin{equation}
x = \frac{-b \pm \sqrt{\Delta}}{2.a}
\end{equation}

- Encontrando $x_1$

\begin{equation}
x_1 = \frac{-b - \sqrt{\Delta}}{2.a}
\end{equation}

- Encontrando $x_2$

\begin{equation}
x_2 = \frac{-b + \sqrt{\Delta}}{2.a}
\end{equation}
